== Breathing and Swallowing Reflexes ==


<img src="http://ahuman.googlecode.com/svn/images/dot/aHuman/LRC_LRB.dot.png" alt="unavailable">

|| *Component ID* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Service* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| [BrainRegionLRC_HM_RA LRC.HM.RA] || Retroambigualis Nucleus || nucleus || LRM || Groups of premotor interneurons producing detailed motor actions || Different combination of activation of these<BR>premotor neurons determines vocalization, vomiting,<BR>coughing, sneezing, mating posture, or child<BR>delivery; ventral respiratory group ||
|| [BrainRegionLRC_HM_TGM_PA5 LRC.HM.TGM.PA5] || Paratrigeminal Nucleus || nucleus || LRS || Orofacial nociceptive sensory processing || Somatosensory reflex, site for nociceptive inputs<BR>from sciatic innervation field ||
|| [BrainRegionLRC_HP_PN_KFN LRC.HP.PN.KFN] || Kolliker-Fuse Nucleus || nucleus || LRM || Control of protruder tongue muscles contraction to maintain respiration || To hypoglossal nucleus and phrenic nucleus; pontine<BR>respiratory group = KFN + Medial PBN ||
|| [BrainRegionLRC_HP_PN_SC LRC.HP.PN.SC] || Nucleus Subceruleus || nucleus || LRM || Tongue control || To hypoglossal nucleus; A7 group ||
|| [BrainRegionLRC_HP_PRF_CRF LRC.HP.PRF.CRF] || Caudal Pontine Reticular Nucleus || nucleus || LRM || Mediate head movements || Grinding of the teeth in sleep, projections from<BR>superior colliculus, to spinal cord, extends to<BR>facial ||
|| [BrainRegionLRC_HP_PRF_PVR LRC.HP.PRF.PVR] || Parvocellular Reticular Nucleus || nucleus || LRM || Flow of respiratory current out of organism || Projects to facial nucleus, hypoglossal nucleus and<BR>parabrachial nucleus ||
